message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
You can have less, I'll take more. Your turn to decide!
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not willing to give up too much. Your turn!
You're not giving up enough. I'll take 7000 and leave you with 3000. Your turn to decide!
I'll compromise a bit more. You're getting closer to your 7000, but I'm still holding out for a better share.
You're not budging, so I'll take 8000 and leave you with 2000. This is my last offer!
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. This is my last chance to get a fair share.
